settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: We typically ship within 1–2 business days. Domestic orders arrive in 3–7 business days.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes. We ship to many countries. Delivery times vary by destination.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking link.

settings.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.answer: Contact us as soon as possible. We can modify or cancel orders that haven't shipped yet.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer 30-day returns on unused items in original condition.

settings.question: How do I start a return?
settings.answer: Visit our returns page or contact us. We'll send you a prepaid label if eligible.

settings.question: Can I exchange for a different size?
settings.answer: Yes. Start a return and place a new order for the size you need, or contact us for an exchange.

settings.question: When will I receive my refund?
settings.answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days after we receive your return.

settings.question: How do your sizes run?
settings.answer: Our sizes run true to standard. Check the size guide on each product page.

settings.question: Are your products unisex?
settings.answer: Many of our styles are unisex. See the product description for fit details.

settings.question: How should I care for my items?
settings.answer: Follow the care instructions on the label. Most items can be machine washed cold and tumble dried low.

settings.question: Will the prints crack or fade?
settings.answer: With proper care, our prints hold up well. Wash inside out and avoid high heat.

settings.question: What makes your clothing sustainable?
settings.answer: We use organic and recycled materials, ethical manufacturing, and reduce waste where we can.

settings.question: Is your packaging eco-friendly?
settings.answer: We use recycled and recyclable packaging and avoid single-use plastic where possible.

settings.question: Do you offset carbon emissions?
settings.answer: We're working on carbon-neutral shipping options. Details are on our Sustainability page.
